data.description: This cutting-edge space tourism website revolutionizes the way we experience the cosmos by seamlessly melding technology and adventure.
The web application transforms images into CSS art by first converting the image to SVG and then converting the SVG path into the 'css clip-path: Polygon()' format.
A responsive form that updates card details in real-time. Receive error messages for incomplete or incorrect fields. Interactive elements display hover, active, and focus states.
a Quiz app using React, fetching data from an API, adding form control, implementing dark mode, and managing state using Context.
Tenzies, a fun and fast-paced dice game, completed as part of the challenge. Ready to roll the dice? Let's play!
